feed.title: Channel-Port aux Basques - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 12:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.7°C
Wind: SSW 48 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 12:02 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:02 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 12:02 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
